title: Jump to navigation header on Clips page
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is on the Clips page
custom_steps:
WHEN the user navigates to the bottom of the Clips page
AND the user presses the [triangle] button on the controller
custom_expected:
THEN the [Clips] button in the navigation header at the top of the screen gains focus
AND the page scrolls to the top
AND the user stays on the Clips page
